DOC.brief_summary: Use modern diagnostic tool e.g . fetal fibronectin ultrasound measurement cervical length diagnose preterm labor result improve outcome compare traditional diagnosis base digital examination measure cervical change .
DOC.detailed_description: Symptomatic preterm labor patient randomized diagnosis preterm labor serial digital examination versus algorithm incorporate transvaginal ultrasound measurement cervical length vaginal fetal fibronectin .
DOC.criteria: symptomatic complaint suggestive preterm labor great 6 contraction per hour multiple gestation rupture amniotic membrane chorioamnionitis congenital malformation persistent vaginal bleeding abruptio placenta placenta previa previously diagnose short cervix < 2.5 cm cervical dilation > 3 cm cervical cerclage exposure tocolytic drug allergy contraindication nifedipine
